titleStmt.title: By the King, a declaration. James R. As we cannot consider this invasion of our kingdoms, by the Prince of Orange, without horror ....
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Mr. P. B. enginier, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty, for his houshold, chapel, and colledge,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Includes: A list of the foot and horse that are come with the Prince of Orange, as printed in Holland.
Dated at end: Given at our court at Whithall the 6th. of November, 1688. And of our reign the fourth year.
Imperfect: stained with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
